lessons.japanese: 我々はその山脈で土着のガイドを雇った。
lessons.indonesian: We had native guides on our trip to the mountain.

lessons.japanese: これはアルプス山脈の絵です。
lessons.indonesian: This is a view of the Alps.

lessons.japanese: これはアルプス山脈の景色です。
lessons.indonesian: This is a view of the Alps.

lessons.japanese: アルプス山脈はヨーロッパの中央にある。
lessons.indonesian: The Alps are in the center of Europe.

lessons.japanese: あの山脈の名前は何と言いますか。
lessons.indonesian: What's the name of the mountain range?
I saw a chain of mountains.
